# Generalized linear models with the Generalized Estimating Equations for continuous outcomes 


## Correlation matrix

```{r}
## Correlation matrix
matrix <- FBVAR %>%
    select_if(is.numeric) %>% subset(., select = -1)%>%
    cor(.,use = "complete")

corrplot(matrix, method="number")

```
